OrgName: Infor (US), Inc. (as successor to Enwisen, Inc.)
PPLoc: http://www.enwisen.com/exploreoursolutions/Privacy-And-Security/websiteprivacypolicy and employee privacy policy on our company intranet and part of our newhire package and yearly e-mail distributions
activities: Infor through its Enwisen brand is a provider of human resource communications and content solutions to many organizations that are primarily headquartered in the United States.  As part of our single and multi-tenant Software-as-a-Service solution, we capture employee information around demographic data, compensation data, benefits information and employment information. In connection with those services, Infor does not control the data and any access to or use of such data is incidental to completing its contractual requirements for the customer.
